original_text:
In the fear of the Lord one has strong confidence,
    and his children will have a refuge.
korean_text: 여호와를 경외하는 자에게는 견고한 의뢰가 있나니 그 자녀들에게 피난처가 있으리라

sentences.original_text: In the fear of the Lord one has strong confidence
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와를 경외하는 자는 굳은 확신을 가지니

sentences.original_text: his children will have a refuge
